CLASSIC.Content: Light and versatile, the standard weapon is an undeniable classic.

SHORTY.Content: Surprise your enemies up close for maximum efficiency.

FRENZY.Content: At close range, finger on the trigger! At long range... better look for another weapon.

GHOST.Content: Sleek, silent, and efficient at any shooting distance.

SHERIFF.Content: The Sheriff is a modern revolver made for those who aim for precise headshots.

STINGER.Content: Enemies know the end has come when they feel the Stinger's shot.

SPECTRE.Content: In doubt? Go with the Spectre and everything works out.

BUCKY.Content: Attacker? Defender? Doesn’t matter. The important thing is to have this shotgun in hand.

JUDGE.Content: The Judge is a fast-firing automatic shotgun that deals consistent high damage.

BULLDOG.Content: The Bulldog is the kind of weapon that brings satisfaction with every kill.

GUARDIAN.Content: This weapon shines in the hands of patient marksmen.

PHANTOM.Content: The Phantom is a balanced weapon, designed to fire stable shots reaching long distances.

VANDAL.Content: This extremely powerful rifle causes massive damage with small bursts of bullets.

MARSHAL.Content: Pick a good angle, aim, and the target will regret turning that corner.

OPERATOR.Content: Settle in a spot and you’ll be able to control key areas.

OUTLAW.Content: Double barrel, single impact. The perfect choice for the moment of truth.

ARES.Content: Never underestimate the power of this weapon.

ODIN.Content: Wielding such a grand weapon, one thing is certain: the owner ascends to glory while the opponent falls into ruin.
